::: {.incremental}
- DB 2.0 Launched March 7
- *Entirely* new software stack
- Bugs? We're after them!

## Next steps

- Two-week sprint cycles
- This sprint: file uploads, transcoding, bug fixes, UI/UX improvements (~ April 1)
- Next sprint: search, bug fixes, UI/UX improvements (~ April 15)
- DB2 quick start [guide](https://databrary.github.io/guide/quick-start-2.0.html)
